sotd.title: A Joint Effort With State of The DApps
sotd.info: By submitting your DApp information, you acknowledge that your DApp will be listed on {url}

about-your-dapp.name: DApp name
about-your-dapp.tags: A 5-7 word description of your DApp. Please don't include self-promotion or obvious words such as 'blockchain', 'decentralized', or 'Ethereum'
about-your-dapp.dapp-us: Is your DApp available for use in the United States?
about-your-dapp.mock-requirements: Dimensions must be 1200px width by 630px height
about-your-dapp.dapp-icon: Dimensions must be 192px width by 192px height
about-your-dapp.banner: Dimensions must be 1200px width by 206px height
about-your-dapp.contract-audit: Audits are not required for application, but are required by final step.

about-your-team.authors: Separate names or organizations with a comma
about-your-team.author-placeholder: e.g. James Lee, Emilie Roy, Edward McCormick
about-your-team.provide-social-link: Provide at least one social link

provide-text: Please provide all the required information we need.
congrats-msg: It takes about 3-5 business days to review your DApp. And an email will be sent to you if the the status update.
fill-out-required-fields: Please fill out all the required fields.
successful: Great! Your DApp information have been successfully submitted.
try-again: We are sorry. There was an error and DApp submission failed. Please try again, if this error persists, contact support.
progress: Keep going, because you are almost finished...
